title: The old days..
review: Yes, it‚Äôs true, I‚Äôm an OG. I‚Äôve been playing cave game, now Minecraft for as long as it‚Äôs been out. I remember how you could press g or h and you could ‚ÄúClone‚Äù yourself. The old days of classic. I remember when there was a girl in Minecraft, and the old avatars.. (Notch messed up a bit..) it‚Äôs a fun and awesome game. The days of beta were the best. I remember surprise Friday or Friday surprise, but then it stopped. Until an exception- Surprise Saturday. Ah yes. I remember why polar bears were added in the game, and the reason. Jeb‚Äôs wife (I think it‚Äôs Jeb‚Äôs..) liked polar bears, so that‚Äôs why they were added. The original Mobil lite version, and I remember when Minecraft PE was free. All this time it‚Äôs been downloaded in my cloud storage, so I never had to buy it. (Heh) This game never stops improving. But of course, I‚Äôm more of a Java version myself, of course. The days of me and the boys, staying up all night, gaming, building whatever we could. I also remember the day when Microsoft bought Mojang, or did they buy Minecraft? Anyways. The first minecon was about 30 people, mostly Notches‚Äô family. The good ol days of Minecraft. A few things could be changed though. The shooting speed of skeletons is very high, I dislike that, I have some other things, but I don‚Äôt want to keep you from doing your jobs. Thanks so much for these amazing 12 years of Minecraft! You guys rock! I can‚Äôt wait for the cave update! :)
sentence: I‚Äôve been playing cave game, now Minecraft for as long as it‚Äôs been out.

title: The odds are stacked against you
review: I dont know why they do this, but they will rig the game in favor of the AI. It got to the point where I can accurately predict my rolls. If I own 80% of the board, they will only land on the other 20% and that happens 100% of the time. The computer makes trades amongst themselves that aren‚Äôt fair, they‚Äôre only helping each other get sets to knock you out of the game. If you have hotels, the AI WILL NOT LAND ON THEM. Only between your hotels. It‚Äôs laughable at how predictable it is. If a 6 will land you on their hotel, you will roll that 6. I had a property of every color in my last game to ensure no one can build, so what happens? Yup, I land on their railroads only. So what do I do? I buy one of their railroads for a ridiculous price. The next turn, the computer acquired a railroad from another computer to re up the price. I know what you are thinking, why wouldn‚Äôt they buy that railroad prior so that they had all 4? Nah, only when I take the railroad away are they ALL OF A SUDDEN interested. It‚Äôs insanity how much they fix the games in favor of the computer. I have no clue why, we‚Äôve already paid for the game, but they do. It‚Äôs painfully obvious. You‚Äôre welcome for the money I spent.
sentence: Only between your hotels.

title: Not the best update, also where did my 600,000+ coins go?
review: This update is not it honey. I‚Äôve been playing since I was like 5, and the game has never failed to produce quality entertainment. But this, it was just sad to say the least.             It lags, the graphics are childish, and the whole update was a mess. When changing from the character section to the board section I now have to wait for it to load, that didn‚Äôt use to happen. The graphics now seem like a downgrade compared to what it used to be, how do you even do that? Seriously, the game used to be good enough to be played by all ages, but now it seems like only 6 year olds can enjoy the design. Another thing, this may have been a glitch or something, but where did my coins go? I had like 700,000+ coins, but after the update I was down to about 100,000. Not cool. Not cool at all.             I know that you wanted to switch things up, and while I may not like it, it is your game. Hopefully in later updates you will fix things and learn from this experience. Until then, this game will stay deleted. Thanks for the game, at least while it was good. üòî
sentence: This update is not it honey.

title: Freezes up consistently!!!
review: NEW PROBLEM: the game consistently mis moves the pieces! I thought I was making the mistakes but nope every game it happens SEVERAL times. Roll a five & it will go 6 to land you on someone‚Äôs hotel...incredibly frustrating.  The game is also very predictable. If you build properties the next roll the next player almost every time won't land on you. I like the game, however another issue is that it freezes up at crucial junctures of the game. Such as after a trade. You have no choice after several minutes to abandon the game. Very frustrating after vesting so much time into it. Also I just finished a game & I bankrupted every player then it announced the last bankrupted player as the ‚Äúwinner!‚Äù. Ticks you off especially after spending an hour with idiots that want to make the same trade every single turn! I almost quit several times but I hung in there and put up with it because the other normal player suffering through the BS like I was. The game definitely needs some improvements. I would give this 3-1/2 stars but it won‚Äôt let me. PLEASE FIX THE FREEZE UP PROBLEM! CONSTANT CONNECTION PROBLEMS TOO! I check my internet & it‚Äôs connected. And all my other devices are working.
sentence: I would give this 3-1/2 stars but it won‚Äôt let me.

title: Love this game, but...
review: Before update:I love this game! It is so addicting! But I have suggestions, can you add a friending thing? Like where you can friend people so u to it can play with them again. Like if you know the person in real life or if you liked playing with them! Thanks you reading this and I would recommend this game for anyone, even if these suggestions don‚Äôt happen!After Update:The update is, well, weird. The cameras on Polus have glitches all over them so when some walks on camera there is a million copies of them and on some areas, two different camera sections collide and look very weird. The chat, I like that you have the quick chat, but I really don‚Äôt like that we still can‚Äôt just type. It‚Äôs so hard to find what you want to say and by the time you find it, everyone has already voted. Also on the Polus map, the names do disappear, but I kinda like it because you can hide. Another thing on the Polus map, the lava is gone, I see the bubbles still but the actual lava is not there. One last thing, when I am a ghost, I sometimes like to go outside of the map, but I noticed that now there is no wall keeping me from going away too far, can you please bring that wall back? Thanks!
sentence: It is so addicting!

title: Great game.
review: Fun for all. I'd love to see more effort in existing packs, and a broader variety of deck selections. Seriously make "the office" deck. There are tons more great tv shows to play this game with. If you won't pick up more tv shows, you should sell a blank editable deck that we could write our own answers on and play with our own categories. I'd buy that blank deck.
sentence: Fun for all.

title: fun BUT...
review: so i‚Äôve actually be playing this game for a long time and rather enjoy it-it‚Äôs something to keep my mind sharp so the added bonus of being able to design your home is just a plus. this game relates heavily to like a candy crush or anything where you have to eliminate the shapes (‚Äúcandy‚Äù) to complete the level. some of them are hard but that‚Äôs the point, cool thing is you can make your own power ups if you organize your shapes in certain ways-helpful. the issues that i don‚Äôt like is that when you run out of lives (and you don‚Äôt have any coins-or your team hasn‚Äôt sent you any) it takes 25/30 minutes to get just ONE back! lame-also it‚Äôs false advertisement where in the ad to either this game or gardenscapes has you make choices to complete tasks....NOWHERE IN EITHER GAME will this ever be done! it‚Äôs always just the mode where you‚Äôre eliminating shapes. when i first downloaded the game this was very disappointing to me, now it‚Äôs whatever but still not ok if that‚Äôs what you are expecting. this is a fun game though, and has some other cool features-i suggest the download to see if you like it!
sentence: when i first downloaded the game this was very disappointing to me, now it‚Äôs whatever but still not ok if that‚Äôs what you are expecting.
